Notes.Text:
This update for net-snmp fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-15862: Make extended MIB read-only (bsc#1174961)

Vulnerabilities.Description: Net-SNMP through 5.7.3 has Improper Privilege Management because SNMP WRITE access to the EXTEND MIB provides the ability to run arbitrary commands as root.
